user_input:
Modify the DHEM model.
  o	Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastrucutre level (use crud pipeline)
  o	Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastrucutre level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.
  o	Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities
  o	Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 inteconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step
  o	Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operations based on the user's input and the PLEXOS model specifications.

tasks.description: Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to modify the DHEM model, select the appropriate datafile attribute from the available options.

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by copying the H2\Gas file and setting all non-zero values to 999.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to modify the DHEM model, select the appropriate file for modification from the available options.

tasks.description: Add a new scenario called 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to modify the DHEM model, select the appropriate context for adding the new scenario.

tasks.description: Add a 'max flow' property to each object in the H2 Interconnection category in the gas pipeline class, using the datafile and scenario created previously.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to modify the DHEM model, select the appropriate objects in the H2 Interconnection category for property update.

tasks.description: Add a 'max flow' property to each object in the H2 Internal Bottleneck category in the gas pipeline class, using the datafile and scenario created previously.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to modify the DHEM model, select the appropriate objects in the H2 Internal Bottleneck category for property update.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995' to create a new model named 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline' using the clone_transfer_pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to modify the DHEM model, select the appropriate model for cloning.

tasks.description: Update the cloned model to add the new scenario 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to modify the DHEM model, select the appropriate cloned model for scenario update.
